title: Simplify Controller Platform selector by merging Nintendo and PC into Other

requirements.text: Update the Controller Platform <Select> on the Service Request form to remove the separate Nintendo and PC controller options, and treat Nintendo controllers and PC controllers as part of the "Other" selection.

quotes: on the controller platform select can you remove the Nintendo controllers and PC controllers and just let them be inculed in the other selection

acceptanceCriteria: On the Service Request page, the Controller Platform dropdown no longer shows options for "Nintendo Switch Pro", "Nintendo Switch Joy-Con", or "PC/Generic".
The dropdown still includes an "Other" option that users can select instead for Nintendo and PC controllers.
Selecting and submitting the form with platform="Other" continues to work and includes "Platform: Other" in the submitted description payload as before.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
nonGoals: Adding new backend fields or changing the backend ServiceRequest schema.
Adding new platform-specific logic beyond adjusting the dropdown options.
